item.title: 3 Ways I Spend Money to Improve Quality of Life
item.description: The illiterate of the future will not be the person who does not read. It will be the person who does not know how to learn - Alvin Toffler I practice andragogy, which means I am constantly investing in my education as an adult, for betterment, fun, and naturally profit! This takes many forms, but one of the media I consume most is podcasts, and one of the podcasts I intently listen to is The Tim Ferriss Show.
